divs: Sighting Detailsi woke up about 12 am and something told me to look out my bedroom window when i did i saw 6 red light in the sky shaped like a triangle but with the bottom of the triangle the lights where only on the front and sides nothing on the rear i opened my window to see if i could here anything but not a sound in the sky it was moving very slow maybe 2 miles a hour or less i kept watching it for a few more minutes once it reach the edge of the cemerty where the pine trees where and a house was the light went of and i could not see it any more first thing that came to my mind is i seen a ufo when i seen it i was in shock i think because i could not move i had to stay and watch it i have also seen more ufos but on diffrent dates and diffrent shape
Summary: saw ufo in sky over cemetry
